item.title: Highway and data center builder Sterling Infrastructure raised to buy with 51% upside at D.A. Davidson
item.description: Sterling's stock price valuation looks attractive, D.A. Davidson said. The stock is down 34% in three months.

item.title: Nvidia downgraded by one Wall Street firm worried about the DeepSeek effect
item.description: Summit Insights Group downgraded Nvidia to hold from a buy rating on concern that less computing power may be needed for developing large language mod...

item.title: State Street, Apollo team up to launch first of its kind private credit ETF
item.description: Wall Street is eager to provide access to private equity and credit to the masses, and ETFs are the obvious wrapper.

item.title: Here are Thursday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Tesla, Snowflake, Salesforce, Amazon, GE Vernova & more
item.description: Here are Thursday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Morgan Stanley downgrades Modelo importer Constellation Brands as Mexico tariffs loom
item.description: Constellation Brands could feel the squeeze as Mexico tariffs loom ahead, Morgan Stanley wrote.
